metadata.title: CVE-2021-27351 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The Terminate Session feature in the Telegram application through 7.2.1 for Android, and through 2.4.7 for Windows and UNIX, fails to invalidate a recently active session.

criterions.comment: telegram-desktop package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
